cui_name: Polyneuropathy, Hearing Loss, Ataxia, Retinitis Pigmentosa, And Cataract
reasoning: Multi-system genetic syndrome (appears to be variant of PERCA or similar sensory-neurological syndrome). Characterized by peripheral neuropathy, sensorineural hearing loss, ataxia, retinitis pigmentosa, and cataracts. Extremely rare with <50 cases reported worldwide. Estimated <0.001 per 100k globally.
